pr_title: KOGITO-1704 + KOGITO-1124 - Serverless Workflow - Support for Relay and Switch States

timeline.message: KOGITO-1704 - Serverless Workflow - Support for Relay State
adding support for switch state + tests
small update for split default constraint

timeline.bodyText: any reason for this to be a Set specifically? You may use a collection and avoid the new HashSet() altogether.
timeline.author: evacchi

replies.bodyText: Oops - nice catch!!! The default imports were not needed. Removed. Thanks!
replies.author: tsurdilo
